mapper.select: SELECT /* pagmktcounsel.xml : pagmkt.pagmktcounsel.selectPaGmktQna */ PQ.PA_COUNSEL_SEQ , PQ.PROC_GB , PQ.PA_CODE , PQ.PA_COUNSEL_NO , PQ.COUNSEL_SEQ , PQ.COUNSEL_DATE , PQ.COUNSEL_GB , PQ.PA_GOODS_CODE , PQ.PA_GOODS_DT_CODE , PQ.PA_ORDER_NO , (SELECT PM.ORDER_NO FROM TPAORDERM PM WHERE PM.PA_CODE = PQ.PA_CODE AND PM.PA_ORDER_SEQ = PQ.PA_ORDER_NO AND PM.PA_ORDER_GB ='10' AND ROWNUM = 1 ) AS REF_NO , PQ.ORDER_YN , PQ.DISPLAY_YN , PQ.PA_CUST_NO , PQ.CUST_NAME , PQ.CUST_TEL , PQ.RECEIPT_DATE , PQ.TRANS_YN , PQ.TRANS_DATE , PQ.INSERT_DATE , PQ.INSERT_ID , PQ.MODIFY_DATE , PQ.MODIFY_ID , PD.PA_COUNSEL_DT_SEQ , PD.TITLE , PD.PROC_NOTE , PG.GOODS_CODE , PG.ENTP_CODE , (SELECT CODE_MGROUP FROM TCODE TC WHERE TC.CODE_GROUP = '02' AND TC.CODE_LGROUP = (SELECT TC1.REMARK FROM TCODE TC1 WHERE TC1.CODE_LGROUP = 'C031' AND TC1.CODE_MGROUP = '40') AND TC.REMARK = PQ.COUNSEL_GB ) AS OUT_MGROUP_CODE , NVL((SELECT OM.CUST_NO FROM TPAORDERM PM, TORDERM OM WHERE PQ.PA_ORDER_NO = PM.PA_ORDER_SEQ AND PM.ORDER_NO = OM.ORDER_NO AND ROWNUM = 1 ) ,(SELECT TO_CHAR(CODE_NAME) FROM TCODE TC WHERE TC.CODE_LGROUP = 'O511' AND TC.REMARK1 = CASE WHEN #{siteGb, jdbcType=VARCHAR} = 'PAG' THEN '02' WHEN #{siteGb, jdbcType=VARCHAR} = 'PAA' THEN '03' END ) ) AS CUST_NO , PQ.MSG_GB FROM TPAQNAM PQ , TPAQNADT PD , TPAGMKTGOODS PGM , TPAPRODUCT PG WHERE PQ.PA_COUNSEL_SEQ = PD.PA_COUNSEL_SEQ AND PQ.PA_CODE IN ('21','22') AND UPPER(PQ.PA_GOODS_CODE) = UPPER(PGM.ITEM_NO) AND PQ.PA_CODE = PGM.PA_CODE AND PG.GOODS_CODE = PGM.GOODS_CODE AND PQ.COUNSEL_SEQ IS NULL AND PQ.PROC_GB = '10' AND PQ.TRANS_YN = 0 AND PQ.TRANS_DATE IS NULL AND PD.PROC_GB = '10' AND PD.PA_COUNSEL_DT_SEQ = '1'

SELECT /* pagmktcounsel.xml : pagmkt.pagmktcounsel.selectPaGmktUrgentQna */ PQ.PA_COUNSEL_SEQ , PQ.PROC_GB , PQ.PA_CODE , PQ.PA_COUNSEL_NO , PQ.COUNSEL_SEQ , PQ.COUNSEL_DATE , PQ.COUNSEL_GB , PQ.PA_GOODS_CODE , PQ.PA_GOODS_DT_CODE , PQ.PA_ORDER_NO , (SELECT PM.ORDER_NO FROM TPAORDERM PM WHERE PM.PA_CODE = PQ.PA_CODE AND PM.PA_ORDER_SEQ = PQ.PA_ORDER_NO AND PM.PA_ORDER_GB ='10' AND ROWNUM = 1 ) AS REF_NO , PQ.ORDER_YN , PQ.DISPLAY_YN , PQ.PA_CUST_NO , PQ.CUST_NAME , PQ.CUST_TEL , PQ.RECEIPT_DATE , PQ.TRANS_YN , PQ.TRANS_DATE , PQ.INSERT_DATE , PQ.INSERT_ID , PQ.MODIFY_DATE , PQ.MODIFY_ID , PD.PA_COUNSEL_DT_SEQ , PD.TITLE , PD.PROC_NOTE , PG.GOODS_CODE , PG.ENTP_CODE , (SELECT CODE_MGROUP FROM TCODE TC WHERE TC.CODE_GROUP = '02' AND TC.CODE_LGROUP = (SELECT TC1.REMARK FROM TCODE TC1 WHERE TC1.CODE_LGROUP = 'C031' AND TC1.CODE_MGROUP = '40') AND TC.REMARK = PQ.COUNSEL_GB AND ROWNUM = 1 ) AS OUT_MGROUP_CODE , NVL((SELECT OM.CUST_NO FROM TPAORDERM PM, TORDERM OM WHERE PQ.PA_ORDER_NO = PM.PA_ORDER_SEQ AND PM.ORDER_NO = OM.ORDER_NO AND ROWNUM = 1 ) ,(SELECT TO_CHAR(CODE_NAME) FROM TCODE TC WHERE TC.CODE_LGROUP = 'O511' AND TC.REMARK1 = CASE WHEN #{siteGb, jdbcType=VARCHAR} = 'PAG' THEN '02' WHEN #{siteGb, jdbcType=VARCHAR} = 'PAA' THEN '03' END ) ) AS CUST_NO FROM TPAQNAM PQ , TPAQNADT PD , TPAGMKTGOODS PGM , TPAPRODUCT PG WHERE PQ.PA_COUNSEL_SEQ = PD.PA_COUNSEL_SEQ AND PQ.PROC_GB = PD.PROC_GB AND PQ.PA_CODE IN ('21','22') AND UPPER(PQ.PA_GOODS_CODE) = UPPER(PGM.ITEM_NO(+)) AND PQ.PA_CODE = PGM.PA_CODE(+) AND PGM.GOODS_CODE = PG.GOODS_CODE(+) AND PQ.COUNSEL_SEQ IS NULL AND PQ.PROC_GB = '10' AND PQ.TRANS_YN = '0' AND PQ.TRANS_DATE IS NULL AND PD.PA_COUNSEL_DT_SEQ = '1' AND PQ.INSERT_DATE > TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 3

SELECT /* pagmktcounsel.xml : pagmkt.pagmktcounsel.selectPaGmktAnsQna */ SQ.PA_COUNSEL_SEQ , SQ.PA_COUNSEL_NO , SQ.PA_GOODS_CODE , CM.GOODS_CODE , CD.TITLE , CD.PROC_NOTE , CD.PROC_ID , CD.PROC_DATE , DECODE(TC.CODE_MGROUP,'20','PA_TEST', TC.CODE_MGROUP,'21','PA_BROAD','22','PA_ONLINE') AS PA_API_KEY , SUBSTR(SQ.PA_COUNSEL_NO,1,LENGTH(SQ.PA_COUNSEL_NO)-3) AS ORIGIN_PA_COUNSEL_NO , SQ.TOKEN , SQ.PA_GROUP_CODE FROM TPAQNAM SQ , TCUSTCOUNSELM CM , TCUSTCOUNSELDT CD , TCODE TC WHERE SQ.COUNSEL_SEQ = CM.COUNSEL_SEQ AND CM.COUNSEL_SEQ = CD.COUNSEL_SEQ AND SQ.PA_CODE = TC.CODE_MGROUP AND TC.CODE_LGROUP = 'O501' AND TC.CODE_GROUP = '02' AND TC.USE_YN = '1' AND CD.DO_FLAG = '40' AND CD.PROC_DATE > SYSDATE - 3 AND SQ.TRANS_YN = '0' AND SQ.MSG_GB = #{msgGb, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND SQ.PA_CODE = #{paCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND SQ.PA_GROUP_CODE = CASE WHEN #{siteGb, jdbcType=VARCHAR} = 'PAG' THEN '02' WHEN #{siteGb, jdbcType=VARCHAR} = 'PAA' THEN '03' END
SELECT /* pagmktcounsel.xml : pagmkt.pagmktcounsel.selectPaQnaDtMaxSeq */ MAX(P.PA_COUNSEL_DT_SEQ) + 1 FROM TPAQNADT P WHERE P.PA_COUNSEL_SEQ = #{paCounselSeq, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
